original_title: Tuina Therapy - Passive Joint Movement & Traction
overview: Tuina Chinese Bodywork is the manual therapy of traditional Chinese Medicine.  Tuina uses hand techniques to effect changes in the balance of the circulation of the Qi, vital energy, through the acupuncture channels of the body and its musculoskeletal relationships.  This video features the application of Tuina passive joint and traction techniques. These methods open the joints, restore functional anatomy, and harmonize the circulation of Qi and blood.
title: Tuina Therapy - Passive Joint Movement & Traction
